problem_names: lemma [simp]: "compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es = map (compE\<^sub>1 Vs) es"

lemma [simp]: "\<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = sub_RI e"
 and [simp]: "\<And>Vs. sub_RIs (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = sub_RIs es"
lemma comp_final: "final e \<Longrightarrow> compE\<^sub>1 Vs e = fin\<^sub>1 e"

lemma [simp]:
      "\<And>Vs. max_vars (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = max_vars e"
and "\<And>Vs. max_varss (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = max_varss es"
translations: lemma [simp]: "compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es = map (compE\<^sub>1 Vs) es"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es = map (compE\<^sub>1 Vs) es

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es = map (compE\<^sub>1 Vs) es
by(induct es type:list) simp_all

lemma [simp]: "\<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = sub_RI e"
 and [simp]: "\<And>Vs. sub_RIs (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = sub_RIs es"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = sub_RI e) &&&
    (\<And>Vs. sub_RIs (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = sub_RIs es)
proof(induct rule: sub_RI_sub_RIs_induct)

proof (state)
goal (22 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (new x)) = sub_RI (new x)
 2. \<And>x1 x2 Vs.
       (\<And>Vs.
           sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x2) = sub_RI x2) \<Longrightarrow>
       sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (Cast x1 x2)) = sub_RI (Cast x1 x2)
 3. \<And>x Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (Val x)) = sub_RI (Val x)
 4. \<And>x1 x2 x3 Vs.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x1) = sub_RI x1;
        \<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x3) = sub_RI x3\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sub_RI
                          (compE\<^sub>1 Vs
                            (x1 \<guillemotleft>x2\<guillemotright> x3)) =
                         sub_RI (x1 \<guillemotleft>x2\<guillemotright> x3)
 5. \<And>x Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (Var x)) = sub_RI (Var x)
 6. \<And>x1 x2 Vs.
       (\<And>Vs.
           sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x2) = sub_RI x2) \<Longrightarrow>
       sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (x1:=x2)) = sub_RI (x1:=x2)
 7. \<And>x1 x2 x3 Vs.
       (\<And>Vs.
           sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x1) = sub_RI x1) \<Longrightarrow>
       sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (x1\<bullet>x2{x3})) =
       sub_RI (x1\<bullet>x2{x3})
 8. \<And>x1 x2 x3 Vs.
       sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (x1\<bullet>\<^sub>sx2{x3})) =
       sub_RI (x1\<bullet>\<^sub>sx2{x3})
 9. \<And>x1 x2 x3 x4 Vs.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x1) = sub_RI x1;
        \<And>Vs. sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x4) = sub_RI x4\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> sub_RI
                          (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (x1\<bullet>x2{x3} := x4)) =
                         sub_RI (x1\<bullet>x2{x3} := x4)
 10. \<And>x1 x2 x3 x4 Vs.
        (\<And>Vs.
            sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs x4) = sub_RI x4) \<Longrightarrow>
        sub_RI (compE\<^sub>1 Vs (x1\<bullet>\<^sub>sx2{x3} := x4)) =
        sub_RI (x1\<bullet>\<^sub>sx2{x3} := x4)
A total of 22 subgoals...
qed(auto)

primrec fin\<^sub>1:: "expr \<Rightarrow> expr\<^sub>1" where
  "fin\<^sub>1(Val v) = Val v"
| "fin\<^sub>1(throw e) = throw(fin\<^sub>1 e)"
lemma comp_final: "final e \<Longrightarrow> compE\<^sub>1 Vs e = fin\<^sub>1 e"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. final e \<Longrightarrow> compE\<^sub>1 Vs e = fin\<^sub>1 e

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. final e \<Longrightarrow> compE\<^sub>1 Vs e = fin\<^sub>1 e
by(erule finalE, simp_all)

lemma [simp]:
      "\<And>Vs. max_vars (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = max_vars e"
and "\<And>Vs. max_varss (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = max_varss es"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Vs. max_vars (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = max_vars e) &&&
    (\<And>Vs. max_varss (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = max_varss es)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>Vs. max_vars (compE\<^sub>1 Vs e) = max_vars e) &&&
    (\<And>Vs. max_varss (compEs\<^sub>1 Vs es) = max_varss es)
by (induct e and es rule: max_vars.induct max_varss.induct) simp_all
text\<open> Compiling programs: \<close>

definition compP\<^sub>1 :: "J_prog \<Rightarrow> J\<^sub>1_prog"
where
  "compP\<^sub>1  \<equiv>  compP (\<lambda>b (pns,body). compE\<^sub>1 (case b of NonStatic \<Rightarrow> this#pns | Static \<Rightarrow> pns) body)"
declare compP\<^sub>1_def[simp]
end
